Name: Korea Dynasty (조선메타실록)
About the game: The Korea Dynasty The Joseon Dynasty ruled the Korean Peninsula from the 14th to the 20th century. Korea was a centralized bureaucratic and Confucian state. And in terms of grographical location, it survived through diplomacy and war with great powers and successfully made outstanding cultures such as Hangeul as well as advanced science and technology. On the other hand, there was inequality due to the strict status system, and there were so many people who starved even if they worked every day. This game is an exploration and survival game composed of open world and contents by reconstructing the culture and geography of the Korea Dynasty. You will begin as the slave of the Joseon Dynasty who learns survival skills, buys or steals identity to escape from a chased life. Players can be a bandit, merchant, craftsman, bureaucrat or even explorer who search for historical sites in the whole world. The lands of morning calm will be open! What would you choose?
